Title: The Bath Room
Text: I just got in the bathroom and already stinks. Jesus. As I check the toilet, i see a big piece of shit in there. Some pig didn't flush the toilet.
So as someone didn't flush, it was my mission objective to do it.
After that i look around and apart for that piece of shit in the toilet and the smell, it was a very nice bathroom. It had a shower and a jacuzzi.
As i was looking around, i could not find any secret door so the only way was to go back to the bedroom
